Name: Project Sundown
About the game: Project Sundown is a First person zombie wave Shooter Fight through wave's of infected as they grow more powerful and purchase cool new weapons to shred through them Shred Through the infected with 20+ Gun's! Explore 7 playable Map's (More to come) Watch your threat level rise as strong Boss (AI) attempt to put you down
